devices_included: Phone; Tablet; Whiteboard, large vertical display; Tabletop, large horizontal display; Desktop computer
use_cases_desc: Sensemaking. By supporting foraging and sensemaking. In the user study the VAST 2007 scenario was used.
contribution_desc:
The paper contributes VisPorter, a visual analytics system, for use in a multiple display and device environment. VisPorter enables to connect multiple diplays / devices for sensemaking through seamless cross-device activity. 

The tracking of devices is optional, as the system supports a non-tracked mode, where targets of interactions are simulated / can be placed on a touch screen / etc.
toolkits: TUIO; NodeJS; Javascript; HTML5; academic toolkits
